Reviews.Title: Nice kit
Reviews.Author: Martin Mendoza
Reviews.Content: It's a great deal. Camera is modern.  Has lots of functions and the kit has everything that you possibly need.

ProductInfo.Features:
KIT INCLUDES 12 PRODUCTS -- All BRAND NEW Items with all Manufacturer-supplied Accessories + Full USA Warranties:
<1> Nikon Coolpix P520 GPS Digital Camera (Dark Grey) + <2> Transcend 16GB Class 4 SD Card + <3> Spare EN-EL5 Battery +
<4> PD-C10 Camera / Camcorder Case + <5> Zeikos 50" Compact Tripod + <6> HDMI to Mini-HDMI Cable +
<7> PD SDHC Memory Card Reader + <8> PD 5pc Complete Cleaning Kit + <9> PD Flexible Table Mini Tripod +
<10> PD Memory Card Storage Wallet + <11> Image Recovery Software + <12> LCD Monitor Screen Protectors
ProductInfo.Name: Nikon Coolpix P520 GPS Digital Camera (Dark Grey) with 16GB Card + Battery + Case + Tripods + HDMI Cable + Accessory Kit
